title: Introducing: The Sayitaints
body: Flutter; an entirely apt title for the debut track from Baltimore duo The Sayitaints. The beat is sparse and choppy, whilst the vocals hover resplendently over the languid synths, forming an engaging experience. Whilst it appears rooted amongst indie pop influences, with hints of The Antlers breaking the shimmering surface, particularly amongst the vocals, there’s also a more soulful R’n’B vibe throughout the inconsistent percussion section. Every once in a while, the song hits a breakdown, hauntingly echoing the sentiments of Flutter’s protagonist. As the track reaches it’s pinnacle moment, the vocals become desperately strained, opening Flutter up to documenting a whole new parameter of obsession. Check it out below. FLUTTER by THE SAYITAINTS
